entity.name: Temporal
entity.description: Provides standard objects and functions for working with dates and times.
entity.descriptionHtml: Provides standard objects and functions for working with dates and times.
entity.descriptionClean: Provides standard objects and functions for working with dates and times.

webFeature.description_html: The Temporal API allows you to work with dates, times, time zones, and durations. It is more powerful than the Date API.
webFeature.name: Temporal

entity.name: Decorators
entity.description: Functions called on classes or other JavaScript syntax forms during definition.
entity.descriptionHtml: Functions called on classes or other JavaScript syntax forms during definition.
entity.descriptionClean: Functions called on classes or other JavaScript syntax forms during definition.

entity.name: Explicit Resource Management
entity.description: Allocation of a resource and the ability to explicitly release critical resources.
entity.descriptionHtml: Allocation of a resource and the ability to explicitly release critical resources.
entity.descriptionClean: Allocation of a resource and the ability to explicitly release critical resources.

entity.name: Deferring Module Evaluation
entity.description: Modules that would not be executed when loaded, but would be fully loaded to the point of being execution-ready.
entity.descriptionHtml: Modules that would not be executed when loaded, but would be fully loaded to the point of being execution-ready.
entity.descriptionClean: Modules that would not be executed when loaded, but would be fully loaded to the point of being execution-ready.

entity.name: JSON.parse source text access
entity.description: Grant reviver functions access to the input source text.
entity.descriptionHtml: Grant reviver functions access to the input source text.
entity.descriptionClean: Grant reviver functions access to the input source text.

entity.name: Decorator Metadata
entity.description: Extend the Decorators proposal by adding the ability for decorators to associate metadata with the value being decorated.
entity.descriptionHtml: Extend the Decorators proposal by adding the ability for decorators to associate metadata with the value being decorated.
entity.descriptionClean: Extend the Decorators proposal by adding the ability for decorators to associate metadata with the value being decorated.

entity.name: `RegExp.escape`
entity.description: Escaping a string for use inside a Regular Expression.
entity.descriptionHtml: Escaping a string for use inside a Regular Expression.
entity.descriptionClean: Escaping a string for use inside a Regular Expression.

webFeature.description_html: The RegExp.escape() static method takes a string and replaces any characters that are potentially special characters of a regular expression with equivalent escape sequences. For example, RegExp.escape("[abc]") returns "\\[abc\\]".
webFeature.name: RegExp.escape()

entity.name: ShadowRealm API
entity.description: A distinct global environment, with its own global object containing its own intrinsics and built-ins.
entity.descriptionHtml: A distinct global environment, with its own global object containing its own intrinsics and built-ins.
entity.descriptionClean: A distinct global environment, with its own global object containing its own intrinsics and built-ins.

entity.name: Source Phase Imports
entity.description: Customize the loading, linking, and execution of modules beyond the standard host execution model.
entity.descriptionHtml: Customize the loading, linking, and execution of modules beyond the standard host execution model.
entity.descriptionClean: Customize the loading, linking, and execution of modules beyond the standard host execution model.

entity.name: Joint Iteration
entity.description: Synchronise the advancement of multiple iterators.
entity.descriptionHtml: Synchronise the advancement of multiple iterators.
entity.descriptionClean: Synchronise the advancement of multiple iterators.

entity.name: Iterator Sequencing
entity.description: Create iterators by sequencing existing iterators.
entity.descriptionHtml: Create iterators by sequencing existing iterators.
entity.descriptionClean: Create iterators by sequencing existing iterators.

entity.name: Float16Array
entity.description: Add float16 (aka half-precision or binary16) TypedArrays to JavaScript.
entity.descriptionHtml: Add float16 (aka half-precision or binary16) TypedArrays to JavaScript.
entity.descriptionClean: Add float16 (aka half-precision or binary16) TypedArrays to JavaScript.

webFeature.description_html: Float16Array is a typed array of 16-bit floating point numbers.
webFeature.name: Float16Array

entity.name: Signals
entity.description: Used in reactive programming to remove the need to manage updating in applications.
entity.descriptionHtml: Used in reactive programming to remove the need to manage updating in applications.
entity.descriptionClean: Used in reactive programming to remove the need to manage updating in applications.

entity.name: Pipe Operator (`|>`)
entity.description: A new `|>` operator for passing the result of one function to another.
entity.descriptionHtml: A new |> operator for passing the result of one function to another.
entity.descriptionClean: A new |> operator for passing the result of one function to another.

example.code:
input
  |> f(#, 0)
  |> await g(#, { opt: true })
  |> Array.from(#)
  |> console.log(`Result is ${#}.`);
example.codeHighlighted: input |> f(#, 0) |> await g(#, { opt: true }) |> Array.from(#) |> console.log(`Result is ${#}.`);

entity.name: `Record` & `Tuple`
entity.description: Two deeply immutable data structures.
entity.descriptionHtml: Two deeply immutable data structures.
entity.descriptionClean: Two deeply immutable data structures.

entity.name: Pattern Matching
entity.description: A new `match` keyword for pattern-matching objects.
entity.descriptionHtml: A new match keyword for pattern-matching objects.
entity.descriptionClean: A new match keyword for pattern-matching objects.

entity.name: `Observable`
entity.description: A type that can be used to model push-based data sources such as DOM events, timer intervals, and sockets.
entity.descriptionHtml: A type that can be used to model push-based data sources such as DOM events, timer intervals, and sockets.
entity.descriptionClean: A type that can be used to model push-based data sources such as DOM events, timer intervals, and sockets.

entity.name: `map.getOrInsert()`
entity.description: Checking if a key is present, and then inserting or updating depending upon the result, in a single call.
entity.descriptionHtml: Checking if a key is present, and then inserting or updating depending upon the result, in a single call.
entity.descriptionClean: Checking if a key is present, and then inserting or updating depending upon the result, in a single call.

example.codeHighlighted: // Using getOrInsert let prefs = new getUserPrefs(); prefs.getOrInsert("useDarkmode", true); // default to true
